text: Uye iva unovabvunza (Muhammad (SAW)) pamusoro pedhorobha iro rakanga riri pedyo negungwa, pavakapfurikidza mwero maererano neSabata (Mugovera), apo hove dzavo padzaiuya pachena musi weMugovera (Sabata), uye dzainge dzisingauyi kwavari musi wavakanga vasina Sabata. Naizvozvo takava tinoisa miedzo kwavari nokuda kwekusateerera kwavakaita murairo hwaAllah
